ADD TO CHROME

Your ultimate tool to support creators and save big!

Introducing SubscribeHub, the Chrome extension that connects your favorite YouTube creators with the best online discounts. Support content creators and save money effortlessly.

Add to Chrome - It’s Free

How SubscribeHub works

Install the extension

Add SubscribeHub to your browser in seconds and start saving instantly

Connect Your Account

Sync your Google account to access personalized creator discounts

Browse and Get Alerts

Receive pop-up notifications when deals match the sites you visit

Copy and Save

Copy discount codes with one click and enjoy exclusive savings

Tired of missing out
on YouTuber-shared discounts?

Navigating online shopping can be overwhelming, especially when staying loyal to your favorite YouTube creators. It's frustrating to make a purchase only to realize later that a YouTuber you follow had a discount code you could have used. Not only do you miss out on savings, but you also miss the chance to support the creators you love.

Imagine if every online purchase could support the YouTube creators you love, effortlessly

Picture this: you're about to hit ‘Buy Now’ when suddenly, a notification pops up—your favorite YouTuber has a discount code for the very product you’re buying. With SubscribeHub, that’s the reality. No more searching or missed opportunities, just seamless savings that help you support the creators you love.

With subscribehub
dreams become a reality

SubscribeHub effortlessly connects your favorite YouTube channels with the websites you shop from. Here’s how it transforms your online shopping experience:

easy installation

Click "Add to Chrome" on the SubscribeHub website, and within seconds, the extension is ready to elevate your browsing experience.

continue

Unlock Creator Deals

Get access to exclusive discounts from your favorite creators. Save while supporting the channels you love, all in one place!

One-Click Google Login

Log in with your Google account to instantly sync your subscriptions and start receiving personalized discount alerts.  No hassle, just savings!

Save More, Stress Less

Unlock the best creator discounts instantly. Shop and save with confidence, knowing you're always getting the best deal available.

Real-Time Notifications

Stay in the loop with real-time alerts when deals from your subscribed creators match the websites you're browsing.

Embrace
the SubscribeHub Way

Wave goodbye to missed opportunities and scattered promo codes. SubscribeHub ensures your loyalty to favorite YouTubers is recognized and rewarded. It's not just an extension, it's your gateway to a more connected and rewarding online experience.
